assignments.name: Add_to_our_invalid_contractors_page
assignments.label: Add to our invalid contractors page

assignments.name: Copy_2_of_Set_Mechanical_Invalid_false
assignments.label: Copy 2 of Set Mechanical Invalid = false.

decisions.description: This is done in case on our second loop, a previously invalid license is now valid.
decisions.name: Ensure_License_Invalids_False
decisions.label: Ensure License Invalids = False

Flow.description: CG - update to add assignment active = Yes for valid contractors.

formulas.name: ConvertedDate
formulas.expression: DATE( VALUE(RIGHT({!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}, 4)), VALUE(LEFT({!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}, FIND("/", {!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}) - 1)), VALUE(MID({!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}, FIND("/", {!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}) + 1, FIND("/", {!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}, FIND("/", {!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}) + 1) - FIND("/", {!License_Loop.OnlineAPILicense.ExpirationDate}) - 1)) )

Flow.label: Contractor Sub Flow

fields.name: Invalid_Message
fields.fieldText: You have entered invalid contractors in the system. Please review the below information, and update with Licensed, Active contractors.

fields.name: Display_Testing_Text
fields.fieldText:
Hello!

This is a current work in progress demonstrating the current interface work done for validation of Contractors against North Carolina Licensing Board.

As this is a work in progress you might get some un-intended results. If you do: please just check the box below to continue to submission and alert Zachary that you've hit issues on this page)

Check the box below to SKIP the contractor validation.

fields.name: Check_Me_To_SUBMIT_a_record_Hit_Next
fields.fieldText: Check Me To SUBMIT a record. Hit Next to Skip all of this

fields.name: Validation_Message_NC_BL
fields.fieldText: The Town of Clayton verifies all contractor numbers against the North Carolina Licensing Board to ensure entered license numbers are valid.

fields.name: Error_Validation_Message
fields.fieldText: You still need to provide contractors for the below types. These were flagged as being invalid numbers. Please try a new number.

fields.name: Have_additional_contractors_Check_here_to_enter
fields.fieldText: Have additional contractors? Check here to enter

fields.name: Valid_Contractors_Message
fields.fieldText: These are the valid contractors. Please resolve above.

variables.description: Need this to show only relevant fields on prior pages.
variables.name: invalidLicensesExist
